channel.title: Nokip's hooker and drugs fund
channel.description:
We want to get nokip laid and high so we're starting a hooker and drugs fund.
In order to keep it fair and transparent, a few of us will be creating a bitcoin multisig address. This is a special kind of bitcoin address made of several public keys, the signature of a number of the private keys is required to actually spend the money. So anyone donating knows a single person cannot just walk with the cash.
According to jme, there do exist hookers in nokip's area which accept bitcoin. Drugs, of course, are not difficult to buy with bitcoin.
Here is the commands I used for gpg (to save you all reading the manual)
[code] $ gpg -a --clearsign -u yakman
You need a passphrase to unlock the secret key for user: "yakman (wooooohoooooo) <srl@irc.rizon.net>" 2048-bit RSA key, ID F5ABA91D, created 2014-02-17
This is my public key used for the multisig address for nokip's hooker and drugs fund 04c7129596db74c2974b47f0fa3a89963e802b4ca7c8e4d9268b2df8595f975b19611605c6ec12099a11c0ff39c678927d368111b9d8a85b5253db6158f79020e9
<now press ctrl+d>
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE----- Hash: SHA1
This is my public key used for the multisig address for nokip's hooker and drugs fund 04c7129596db74c2974b47f0fa3a89963e802b4ca7c8e4d9268b2df8595f975b19611605c6ec12099a11c0ff39c678927d368111b9d8a85b5253db6158f79020e9 -----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE----- Version: GnuPG v1.4.11 (GNU/Linux)

item.title: Nokip's hooker and drugs fund
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

We want to get nokip laid and high so we’re starting a hooker and drugs fund.

In order to keep it fair and transparent, a few of us will be creating a bitcoin multisig address. This is a special kind of bitcoin address made of several public keys, the signature of a number of the private keys is required to actually spend the money. So anyone donating knows a single person cannot just walk with the cash.

According to jme, there do exist hookers in nokip’s area which accept bitcoin. Drugs, of course, are not difficult to buy with bitcoin.

Here is the commands I used for gpg (to save you all reading the manual)

$ gpg -a --clearsign -u yakman

You need a passphrase to unlock the secret key for
user: "yakman (wooooohoooooo) <srl@irc.rizon.net>"
2048-bit RSA key, ID F5ABA91D, created 2014-02-17

This is my public key used for the multisig address for nokip's hooker and drugs fund
04c7129596db74c2974b47f0fa3a89963e802b4ca7c8e4d9268b2df8595f975b19611605c6ec12099a11c0ff39c678927d368111b9d8a85b5253db6158f79020e9

<now press ctrl+d>
